Text.Page:
There's room for another hunter around the {@Rgn:49003$$Agnurok Engine}, if you'd like.

{@LinkCreature:76#3010#Beiran} will prepare you.

Getting to the {@Rgn:49003$$Agnurok Engine} is easy. Getting back is trickier. It's full of {@LinkCreature:49#16#zariik cyanowitches} and {@LinkCreature:49#14#kalash defenders}. If they overwhelm you, hole up somewhere and rest.

The {@Rgn:49003$$Agnurok Engine} is a challenge, but full of exciting prey.

It's one of my favorite spots.
